headline: Hasbro price target raised to $100 from $95 at BofA
summary: BofA raised the firm’s price target on Hasbro (HAS) to $100 from $95 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after having hosted an investor field trip to Atlanta MagicCon including meetings with CEO Chris Cocks and other executives. Following the meetings, the firm believes Magic can comp a very strong 2025 given the strength of its 2026 set schedule and believes Hasbro has a robust video game pipeline, the analyst tells investors.
